title: You can get All-Clad, Le Creuset, and Staub for amazing prices this weekend
text:
You can get All-Clad, Le Creuset, and Staub for amazing prices this weekend

Shop Williams-Sonoma's cookware sale this weekend and save big on your favorite brands. (Photo: Williams Sonoma)

The holiday season is fast approaching, and I'm already in a tizzy thinking about the cozy dinner parties, Friendsgivings, and ugly sweater parties I want to host. I'll want my kitchen to be in tip-top shape for my guests of course, and that means I need to have some eye-catching cookware front and center. If your kitchen is lacking in that department like mine is, you're in luck, because this weekend everyone's favorite kitchenware retailer, Williams Sonoma, is running a massive sale you won't want to miss.

For their Cookware Event which runs until October 7 at midnight, Williams Sonoma is offering some serious discounts on coveted brands such as Le Creuset, Staub, Lodge, and All-Clad. We're talking up to 65% off on the best pots and pans, dutch ovens, cast iron skillets, and so much more, all from the most popular brands that are known for their quality of construction, durability, and lovely exteriors.

So, whether you just moved into a new place and want to invest in some quality cookware, or just want to add to your collection, you're sure to find an amazing new addition to your kitchen with this sale. We went ahead and scoped out all the deals Williams Sonoma is offering, and compiled a list of our top picks, like this Le Creuset Signature Cast-Iron 3 1/2-Qt. Essential Oven (just $149.95), this Lodge Blacklock 12-inch Cast-Iron Skillet (just $63.96), or this All-Clad Stainless-Steel Nonstick Fry Pan (now $149.95). Find more of the best deals ahead, and if you see something you like, make sure you snag it before this sale comes to an end on Monday.
